title: Resize tool does not change inertial properties

content.raw:
The resize tool changes the size of collision and visual objects, but it does not change the inertial properties of the link. If "View Center of Mass / Inertia" is enabled for a resized object, however, the inertia box is scaled along with the other visuals. This is misleading.

To be consistent, gazebo should either:

1. Scale the inertial values as the object is resized. OR

2. Visualize the correct inertia when the object is resized.
